kun reading compounds: 鍔【つば】guard on sword, polearms, etc., flange, brim, visor (e.g. of a hat)
鍔音【つばおと】sound when stopping the blade of a sword with the guard
金鍔【きんつば】confection of sweetened beans wrapped in wheat-flour dough (in the shape of a sword guard), metal sword guard, polearm
どじょう汁に金鍔【どじょうじるにきんつば】two things that do not go well together, pairing kintsuba with loach soup
